quotes.quote: No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance?
What is the difference between unethical and ethical advertising? Unethical advertising uses falsehoods to deceive the public; ethical advertising uses truth to deceive the public.
My son is now an 'entrepreneur.' That's what you're called when you don't have a job.
The easiest job in the world has to be coroner. Surgery on dead people. What’s the worst thing that could happen? If everything went wrong, maybe you’d get a pulse.
If you had to identify in one word the reason why the human race has not achieved and never will achieve its full potential, that word would be 'meetings.
I will always choose a lazy person to do a hard job, because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.
Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
Oh, you hate your job? Why didn't you say so? There's a support group for that. It's called EVERYBODY, and they meet at the bar.
I like work; it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
It's a recession when your neighbor loses his job; it's a depression when you lose yours.
When a man tells you that he got rich through hard work, ask him: Whose?
Doing nothing is very hard to do...you never know when you're finished.
The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
I always arrive late at the office, but I make up for it by leaving early.
A lot of fellows nowadays have a B.A., M.D., or Ph.D. Unfortunately, they don't have a J.O.B.
I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.
Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing.
The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen.
If you don't know what to do with many of the papers piled on your desk, stick a dozen colleagues initials on them and pass them along. When in doubt, route.
Anyone can do any amount of work, provided it isn't the work he's supposed to be doing at that moment.
I think Smithers picked me because of my motivational skills. Everyone says they have to work a lot harder when I’m around.
The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
When we're unemployed, we're called lazy; when the whites are unemployed it's called a depression.
A celebrity is a person who works hard all his life to become well known, then wears dark glasses to avoid being recognized.
Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
The first thing a new employee should do on the job is learn to recognize his boss' voice on the phone.
If A equal success, then the formula is A = X + Y + Z. Where X is work. Y is play and Z is keep your mouth shut.
God put me on this Earth to accomplish a certain number of things. Right now, I am so far behind I will never die.
Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense enough to be lazy.
I am a friend of the working man, and I would rather be his friend, than be one.
If hard work is the key to success, most people would rather pick the lock.
Work is the greatest thing in the world, so we should always save some of it for tomorrow.
Time is an illusion. Lunchtime is doubly so.
It's better to have one person working with you than three people working for you.
Why do people say they wish every day was Friday? If it was always Friday, we’d be here every freakin’ day.
People who never do any more than they get paid for, never get paid for any more than they do.
Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
I’ve got all the money I’ll ever need, if I die by four o’clock.
It takes less time to do a thing right, than it does to explain why you did it wrong.
Son, if you really want something in this life, you have to work for it. Now quiet! They’re about to announce the lottery numbers.​
Lisa, if you don’t like your job you don’t strike. You just go in every day and do it really half-assed. That’s the American way.
A professional is a man who can do his job when he doesn’t feel like it; an amateur is one who can’t when he does feel like it.
Show me a man who is a good loser and I’ll show you a man who is playing golf with his boss.
I try to take one day at a time, but sometimes several days attack me at once.
You don't get paid for the hour. You get paid for the value you bring to the hour.
The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs… one step at a time.
People are still willing to do an honest day’s work. The trouble is they want a week’s pay for it.
Early to bed and early to rise probably indicates unskilled labor.
If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldn't have a job if he was any smarter.
There’s no secret about success. Did you ever know a successful man who didn’t tell you about it?​
When my boss asked me who is the stupid one, me or him? I told him everyone knows he doesn't hire stupid people.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
An expert is a man who has made all the mistakes which can be made in a very narrow field.
People who work sitting down get paid more than people who work standing up.
Work is a necessity for man. Man invented the alarm clock.
Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done.
I love my job only when I'm on vacation.
By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
Every day I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I’m not there, I go to work.
The taxpayer – that’s someone who works for the federal government but doesn’t have to take the civil service examination.
Nothing is so embarrassing as watching someone do something that you said couldn't be done.
Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
The closest to perfection a person ever comes is when he fills out a job application form.​
Why join the navy if you can be a pirate?
Whenever you are asked if you can do a job, tell 'em, Certainly, I can! Then get busy and find out how to do it.
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
Are you aware that rushing toward a goal is a sublimated death wish? It’s no coincidence we call them “deadlines.
I need a six-month vacation, twice a year.
The human race is faced with a cruel choice: work or daytime television.
Some days, the best thing about my job is that the chair spins.
Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
An expert is a man who tells you a simple thing in a confused way in such a fashion as to make you think the confusion is your own fault.

It’s a shame that the only thing a man can do for eight hours a day is work. He can’t eat for eight hours; he can’t drink for eight hours; he can’t make love for eight hours. The only thing a man can do for eight hours is work.
A lot of people quit looking for work as soon as they find a job.
Don’t be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
